General.Name: Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent management and security protection solutions for communication and information networks. The company offers network and machine data visualization collection platform, such as data aggregation and distribution management products for broadband internet; data collection and data analysis products for mobile access networks; machine data collection products; network content security products for international markets; big data operation platform, etc., as well as DPI products and business intelligence enterprise solutions. It provides technical solution consulting services; project implementation supporting services; remote technical support services; onsite fault handling technical services; technical material services; software upgrade services; network regular inspection services; and onsite duty support services. The company serves government, operators, and industry customers. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. in March 2015. Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 021, Si Chuang Building, Shenzhen, China, 518057
